titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of real property at Fort Ord, California, to the University of California and the California State University.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1601-1602)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense to convey to the University of California and the California State University certain surplus real property at Fort Ord, California.
